p   d  n nS p p  pd  ndp  p   p   p d nd p   mn d p dp

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
ammA enRu varum kanRukutti adhu thAimaiyai koNdAduthu 
kukkoo enRu varum chinna kuyil than kuzhandhaikku sOroottudhu 
kaNNOdu pAsam vanthAdumbOdhu 
nenjOdu nEsam ARAgumE 
nee inRi enRum nAnillaiyE
